[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-store](./foundation-store.md) &gt; [Store](./foundation-store.store.md) &gt; [errors](./foundation-store.store.errors.md)

## Store.errors property

Contains any errors the store may have, see [ErrorMap](./foundation-store.errormap.md).

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly errors: ErrorMap<EventDetailMap>;
```

## Example 1

Errors can be looked up by event key:

```ts
${when(x => x.trades.errors.has('trade-insert-error'), html<TradeInsertErrorFeedback>`...`)}
```

## Example 2

Errors can be bound to collectively:

```ts
<pre>${x => x.trades.errors.messages}</pre>
```
